raw_text: A= (a (i, j)) (0? i? l; i? j? l) (1) where l is the number of bunsetsus in a sentence, diagonal element a (i, j) is the i-th bunsetsu, and element a (i, j) (i < j) is the similarity value between bunsetsus bi and bj.
